mapper.select: SELECT no, title, startDate, endDate, writeDate, updateDate FROM notice ORDER BY no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(no, title, content, startDate, endDate) VALUES(notice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate}, writeDate = #{writeDate} WHERE no = #{no}
